metadata.titleEn: Permafrost degradation increases risk and large future costs of infrastructure on the Third Pole
metadata.titleCn: 多年冻土退化增加了第三极基础设施的风险和未来成本论文数据
metadata.description: This is the predicted future permafrost hazard level data sets and the original data for Figure 2, 3, and 4 in Communications Earth & Environment publication (2022, 3, 238.doi: 10.1038/s43247-022-00568-6).
metadata.descriptionCn:
多年冻土退化通过降低基底强度、增加物质运移和热融活动频率等方式威胁基础设施的安全，导致其维护成本增加、使用寿命缩短，造成现实的经济损害。
该数据集是发表在Communications Earth & Environment (2022,3,238.doi: 10.1038/s43247-022-00568-6)关于青藏高原未来多年冻土退化经济损害的论文数据。该数据集包括了预测的青藏高原空间分辨率为1km的未来多年冻土危险等级数据和论文中图2、3、4的原始数据。
metadata.instructions:
Data format is ESRI GRID for the potential hazard level of permafrost degradation.
Data format is Excel for Source data of Figure.

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the features of datasets used to assess the risk of infrastructure damage due to permafrost degradation in the Third Pole region?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于评估第三极地区因永久冻土退化而导致基础设施损坏风险的数据集的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: predicted future permafrost hazard levels, spatial resolution of 1km, raw data corresponding to figures in the research paper
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 预测未来永久冻土危险水平，空间分辨率为1公里，与研究论文中的图表相对应的原始数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data collection techniques enable the assessment of permafrost degradation risks to infrastructure in the Third Pole region?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据收集技术能够评估第三极地区基础设施的永冻土退化风险？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Data collection techniques for assessing permafrost degradation risks in the Third Pole region involve acquiring high-resolution spatial data, such as 1km resolution datasets, to predict future permafrost hazard levels. These techniques also include the collection of baseline data on base strength, material transport, and thermokarst activity frequencies, which are critical for evaluating infrastructure safety and estimating future economic impacts.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 评估第三极地区永久冻土退化风险的数据收集技术涉及获取高分辨率空间数据，例如1公里分辨率的数据集，以预测未来的永久冻土危害水平。这些技术还包括收集关于基础强度、物质运输和热卡斯特活动频率的基线数据，这些数据对于评估基础设施安全和估算未来经济影响至关重要。
